alert.note: Alert for Berks; Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Berks, Montgomery, northeastern Chester and central Delaware Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cedarville to near Pughtown to near Kennett Square. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Chester, Norristown, Pottstown, Phoenixville, West Norriton, East Norriton, Westtown, Downingtown, Conshohocken, Swarthmore, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, Schwenksville, Bechtelsville, Green Lane, Cheyney, Pughtown, Bryn Mawr and Marshallton. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 309 and 335. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 38. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 335. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 2 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Berks; Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
